```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> import scipy as sp
>>> sparse_matrix = sp.sparse.csc_matrix([[0, 0, 3], [4, 0, 0]])
>>> sparse_matrix
<2x3 sparse matrix of type '<class 'numpy.int64'>'
 with 2 stored elements in Compressed Sparse Column format>
>>> sparse_matrix.toarray()
array([[0, 0, 3],
 [4, 0, 0]], dtype=int64) 
```
